alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 01 at 3:58AM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. Strong winds with the front may also cause blowing and drifting of snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will bring a band of moderate to heavy snow between 6 am and 10 am depending on location, lasting 1-2 hours in most locations. Significant impacts are possible for travel including the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
